Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Gloria retaliates against Jack via GC Buzz 
Candace Young Thursday, February 2nd, 2017 
Friday February 3, 2017: Ashley and Ravi discuss dating, Hilary calls Devon’s bluff, and Sharon breaks bad news to Faith. Pin 
At GC Buzz, Hilary is surprised at Devon’s compliment. He notes her apology may have cost her a few fans. She says she only cares about his opinion. This leads Devon to surmise she apologized for his benefit. Frustrated, Hilary tells him she loves him enough to give him up if that’s what he wants. 
At Brash & Sassy, Cane wonders why Jill is selling when Billy and Victoria haven’t gotten back together yet. Jill is in a hurry to sell. Billy notes she must know what she wants to do with the money. Jill confirms she plans to get Fenmore’s back. After, Cane tells Billy he’ll give Jill a check for 1/3 of the company and a year from now will buy them out. 
In Jack’s office, Gloria taunts him about not wanting to leave her bed. Elsewhere, Ravi listens as Ashley and Phyllis bicker. Ash enters Jack’s office in time to hear Glo holler that she has the right to talk about whatever she wants to. Ash wonders what the hell she’s interrupting. Jack lies that Gloria is worried about him taking advantage of Lauren. Glo exits. Ash launches into a rant about Phyllis wanting Ravi’s brain. Jack feels Phyllis needs him more right now. Ash leaves and runs into Ravi, who plans to tell Jack that Jabot Go is his priority. He admits he was flattered by her fighting with Phyllis over him. Ash suggests they go elsewhere. By the elevator, Vikki runs into Phyllis. Vikki fields a call from Reed, and Phyllis recalls how she and Daniel used to butt heads. Victoria realizes Billy talked to Phyllis and tells her to mind her business. 
More: Y&R’s Ray Wise (Ian Ward) in Twin Peaks miniseries 
At The Underground, Nick is stunned at Noah’s news that Dylan left Sharon and Genoa City. Noah’s worried about Sharon. Later, Ravi assures Ashley that her needs will always be his priority. Ash discourages romance in the workplace and talks about her divorces. Ravi worries if she can’t make it work, what hope is there for the rest of them? Talk turns to online dating and what they want in a partner. Ash likes the alpha males. Ravi opines there are many strong men who don’t beat their chests. Ash says if he finds one, to send him her way. 
In Sharon’s house, Mariah is teary-eyed over Dylan leaving her mother. Mariah has her back. Sharon must be strong for Faith; it’s going to break her heart to learn she’s losing someone she loves because of her mistakes. 
Sharon arrives at the ranch where Nikki and Victor sit nearby as Sharon tells Faith that Dylan has left forever because he didn’t want to be around her anymore. Faith yells at Sharon that she ruins everything. The girl runs upstairs, and Nikki reassures Sharon, who then leaves. Victor tells Nikki they’ll have to convince Faith to forgive Sharon. Nikki will handle it. Later, Nikki tells Faith that things are complicated and what she said to her mother made her feel worse. 
Related: CBS daytime actress to co-host Entertainment Tonight 
Gloria arrives at GC Buzz and introduces herself to Mariah as Kevin’s mother. She reveals she has a story; it’s about sexual harassment and intimidation by one of the biggest corporations in Genoa City. Soon, Mariah is interviewing Glo under an assumed name. Gloria describes how she consulted on a deal that went through, and then the businessman wanted sexual favors. She gave him what he wanted because she desperately needed the job. “All night. He was insatiable.” He dismissed her afterward. Mariah asks ‘Clarissa’ to reveal the man’s identity. Glo reveals it was Jack Abbott. Later, Mariah tells Hilary she’s got a juicy story. Distracted, Hilary tells her to run with it. She then presents Devon with an envelope – divorce papers. 
At the Chancellor mansion, Jill says it’s good to have Esther back. Colin worries the Fenmore’s stuff is stressing his wife out. He learns she’s selling Brash & Sassy and admits it could be a good plan. He suggests they go on a cruise for a week. Jill agrees – she’ll return ready to take on Jack. “Nobody screws me over and gets away with it!” Colin gets a strange expression on his face. 
Nick pays Sharon a visit. She wonders if he’s there to gloat and assures him she’s taking her meds. Nick feels Dylan shouldn’t have taken off. Sharon worries Faith will never forgive her. Nick is genuinely surprised at Dylan’s choice. Faith arrives and apologizes to Sharon. They embrace.

Jack finds Gloria having a drink at the Club bar – she’s celebrating his demise. 
In Brash & Sassy’s office, Vikki reads Billy the riot act for discussing her life with Phyllis. Billy storms out. Meanwhile, Cane is on the phone saying he wants to sell all his holdings to buy a cosmetics company. In the office, Victoria tells Victor about buying 1/3 of Brash & Sassy. Victor reminds her she built that company from the ground up and should own the whole damn thing. “Buy it.” In the elevator, Billy encounters Phyllis. He gripes briefly before pushing the stop button and kissing her passionately! 
Next on The Young and the Restless: 
Victoria says to Reed, "I doubt that Johnny and Katie are interested in live cam shows of 'The World's Naughtiest Nymphs'!" 
Gloria says, "You really should be watching this show, Jack, if you're out of the loop you'll feel like a real idiot." 
Hilary, seated beside Mariah, says into the camera, "We have an exclusive story that you won't want to miss."
